website_summaries.verdict: A huge memory foam beanbag chair that's perfect for lounging, but too soft to replace your couch.
pros: Soft cushion ideal for stretching out on
cons: Some have complained of trouble getting it to fluff up

customer_reviews.title: Couch sack
customer_reviews.text: I have a new addition to my living room furniture, this bean bag couch sack is so comfy and soft. It's filled with chunks of memory foam that fluffs back up when you get up off of it. There was no odor or anything when we unpacked it and it was a fun workout trying to break up the foam inside (because I'm disabled) but once that was done it fluffed right up. The thing is 6ft long and like laying on a cloud 😁 I am extremely happy with my couch sack and so is my husband as you can see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fall to the floor!
customer_reviews.text: I am sooooooo incredibly disappointed... I let it fluff up and constantly tossed it about to encourage optimum fluffiness(gently, but this bag is a beast...Very heavy)... But when I sat on it I literally hit the floor...Hard... I had three other adults (of small stature) and they said it was incredibly uncomfortable... I can only assume that this bag was VERY VERY VERY underfilled... There is NO way they could possible sell a product like this and have ANY positive reviews... My 4 year old even sinks down waaayyyyy too far! (Of course she just thinks the object in general is fun...) HUGE WASTE OF MONEY! HUGE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not 6', which was the deciding factor on buying this lumpy, smelly thing. Worth it for the money, I suppose... Should have spent the extra $100 and purchased the better one currently sold on Amazon. Update: 2 weeks in and it just gets worse. Regret every penny and second spent on this thing. Does not fluff back up and the areas surrounding the permanent sag are as hard as rocks. Smell has yet to fade and it retains heat. I hate this stupid thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color and style
customer_reviews.text: So I tried to do this the right way but seems it's going unheard. I ordered the magenta(sp) couch and got this orange chair. Im a combat veteran with a spinal injury and use the bean bag couches to help with pressure points so we got this to replace our old one which our animals claimed as theres now. This orange thing isn't big enough for me to lay down. I have used this company before and this is the first time this has happened. Highly disappointed. To date there has been no remedy for the wrong size and color.
customer_reviews.author: SGTArmyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Big Mistake
customer_reviews.text: The bean bag sofa that I received doesn't have much in common with the item pictured or described. In the picture the bag is stuffed fulled with the lady riding high. After letting ours expand it is only about 60% full. You can't sit in it at all, but can only lay in it where you will be about a 18 inches off the floor at the highest point and six inches at the lowest. It stated that it would seat 2 - 3 adults. Maybe if it was full, but it's not. The foam chunks don't feel like memory foam either. I regret the purchase. I would return it if I could get it back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Planty

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t look anything like the picture! And how are you supposed to return it after you open it and it starts expanding? By the time you realize it’s not as pictured there basically no way to stuff it back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, oh yes.
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and well packaged. Yes it’s heavy. It’s shrink packed memory foam. But shaped up nicely. It’s more teal than green - which I prefer. It is extremely comfy. I bought it to help me sleep or relax alone - it has been taken over by my kids and pets. As you see.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag seemed to be a little underfilled to support my size and weight. I am short and muscular, so I am heavy and I don't take up much surface area...which made me sink lower than I wanted to. Eventually, the foam expanded enough that I could lay in it lengthwise comfortably. Two people are better than one if you intend to use it as a sofa. I think that there's such a thing as "too much" foam with a product like this. If this is underfilled, it's not by much. Seller was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Legion Dairy

customer_reviews.title: Before unboxing, place box where u want the bag (it's large unboxed). Rotate bag.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was superb. A giant bean bag in a small box. Since it was air tight it took some time for the foam to re-expand. I waited a couple days but the filling was not as filled as expected so I contacted the company and they sent more filling. Excellent service and I am now thoroughly happy with the product. Would definitely recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: Expert Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with the sofa
customer_reviews.text: It works okay if you wanna use it as a sofa you want to lay on but terrible to sit on. Doesn't hold the sofa posture at all.. Terrible purchase.. I regret it and don't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: ShovonB

customer_reviews.title: So impressive
customer_reviews.text: The box this came in was maybe a fifth the size it is now. We took it out a week or so before my son's bday so it could expand, and expand it did. It's pretty impressive, wish I hadn't put it in the basement to expand, had a hell of a time getting it back up the steps. The fabric is really soft and the kids love it. Color doesn't quite Match the picture but that's not an issue for us.
customer_reviews.author: Fragglekelly

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Smells really really bad. I would buy from elsewhere. It will be going in the trash. I appreciate amazon customer service team for helping me with my issues. May work for some but not for this mom who is not about to have this smell around her kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but feels more like 33%-40% to me
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the lady in the product photo, you would think this sack is filled with stuffing. It's definitely NOT filled, or even close to it. It's "maybe" 50% filled, but feels more like 33%-40% to me, which was a bummer. When you lay in it, you lay pretty close to the ground, which I guess isn't that bad but wasn't exactly what I expected. Good news is that our kids love them. They can dive on them, and all three of them fit on just one of them. So the thing is huge. Relative to the price, it's a solid buy and relatively comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brightful

customer_reviews.title: Great Sack For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Alternative to those expensive Sacks at the mall. After I opened the box and unzipped from pouch. I moved sack downstairs into basement. I let it roll down the stairs which helped expanding process. I placed the expanding sack onto my kids jungle gym and used gravity to help it puff up. It stayed there overnight until it fully puffed up. Picture is 24 hrs from unpacking. I would recommend moving into the room that it will live before it expands. It is unwieldy to move from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian E Stealey

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!!
customer_reviews.text: It really does take time for it to fully fluff up. It will look like it’s done within an hour but it will take days for it to actually become dense. I was worried because I laid on it and i went straight to the floor. A couple days later it was perfect! I would say about 4 days of letting it sit and also flippijg it and trying to break apart all the chunks to be fully fluffed
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: My teenagers and 5 year old LOVE this bean bag
customer_reviews.text: My teenagers and 5 year old LOVE this bean bag. It is huge...easily fits two adults. If we had more room in our family room I would buy another as it's everyone's favorite place to sit.Easily could be used as a place to sleep for friends sleepovers. It does take some time to expand to full size. We were originally sent the wrong color but costumer service was very quick and they are sending out another cover of the correct color. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad my hesitation didn't stop me from this purchase. My daughter and I absolutely love it! It's not 6ft long once foam is fully expanded but, who cares! It's my one perfect purchase. I'll definitely be buying a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised that the quality is so good. It is so nice and squishy I want ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this beanbag, I was pleasantly surprised that the quality is so good. It is so nice and squishy I want one for my bedroom as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Best size and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews but I had too this time!! I can absolutely say that this is one of the best purchase I’ve made in a very long time!! Usually when I order something online it’s either not the right color or not the right size! Not this time!! This is absolutely the perfect color and great size!! It’s huge and I’ve been wanting one of these for forever! If your looking for a comfortable bean bag this is the one! It’s memory foam inside and totally keeps its shape! No sagging in the middle and so very comfortable! Highly recommended! You will not be disappointed! I love this so much !!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: 6 footer poofs up nicely, followed instructions for prep, but wow is it BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't experience the "lack of fluff" problem others have in these comments; I bought 2 6 footers, and both have puffed up to the point where I've considered scraping some foam out to fill a separate pillow. (My wife says no, so that idea is "paused" for a while. :-) ) The camel color is neutral enough to go with my woodtone/earthtone home decor. The inner liner plus the outer cover seem resilient and will likely hold up to adult wear and tear. Since it is not waterproof, I'll be guarding against spilled drinks. After having seen the quality of the build and the style of fill, I'll be coming back to sofa sack for any other similar items.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey L. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Buy this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It came filled so all I had to do was take it out of the compression bag and watch it magically grow. It’s incredibly comfortable and has a sturdy cover with a double zipper so there shouldn’t be any unpleasant surprises of stuffing coming out. My dogs and cats love this thing and I have to wait my turn to use it. Bonus: when I see a cat claiming this massive bed for himself, I am overcome with the adorableness of it all. That’s antidepressants money can’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not enough foam for comfort
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and delivery of the product is good however the overall comfort and experience is lacking. The manufacturer recommends a minimum of 4 days to allow the foam to expand. I have had this product for over 10 days now and the foam has merely filled 60% of the bag. So when you sit on it, you sink right down to the floor. I believe more foam should be in this size. I purchased the 3ft size and it fills out much better, therefore an overall better comfort and experience. If returning such large items were easier, I would return this and buy 2 of the 3ft ones, at almost half the cost
customer_reviews.author: Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love it... super comfortable. It is really heavy so make sure you open it where you plan on keeping it, also its good to roll it around evey so often. There is a slight smell and ours had a broken inside zipper. Only thing I dont like is that there is now removable cover for it just filled with memory foam. But its pretty easy to spot clean... baby wipes are a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Have
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a bedroom but realized that it was way to big for the purpose and it kept getting bigger too, so it ended up going home to my daughters for my grandsons bed. I liked it don't get me wrong I just got the wrong size. It is great for big living rooms or big bedrooms. Please know that it takes up a lot of space if you have a small apartment or dorm.. Recommend though very comfortable and fun to have.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Clabo

customer_reviews.title: and is completely happy about this particular item
customer_reviews.text: I would probably rate this a 4.5, but I decided to round up. My husband loves his chair I purchased for an early Christmas present. He has always wanted one, and is completely happy about this particular item. It's soft and comfortable to sit and/or sleep in. After unpacking the 'bean' bag, we had to wait a day or two for it to fully fluff up since the interior is made up of memory foam. The only downside is that there isn't another layer or 'bag' to hold the foam, so if a child or pet makes a mess on the cover, your only option is to spot clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend would try again!
customer_reviews.text: I was in love right out of the box! Breaking up all the phone was definitely a work out! The only reason I gave it a 4 overall is because I thought that it would be a little more firm, like the girl in the picture looks like she’s Hella far off the ground, but I don’t touch the ground when I sit in it so it’s doing it’s job! It’s pink and soft and me and my plus size boo can fit easily!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rowe

customer_reviews.title: flat , hot , no support.. Avoid !
customer_reviews.text: i fluffed it up a bunch and let it expand , and it does get big and puffy but the foam is not firm so after 5 minutes of sitting or laying on it , it's flat and hard and maybe 6 inches thick , lumpy and gets hot . No support for the back , just not comfortable at all. the old bean bags with beads are far better , going to return this somehow , which will be a huge hassle . Avoid this , get a decent recliner chair...
customer_reviews.author: Tekpc007

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge
customer_reviews.text: It's big no doubt about it. the reason for 4 star's vs 5 is that it seems to need about 20% more stuffing as the bag is very very loose and my daughter about 90lbs sinks pretty far into it. Long term it is probably going to need a refill.
customer_reviews.author: TXAMNZGuy

customer_reviews.title: Too much for too little
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this beanbag chair. But I’ve had it less than a month and it’s reduced it’s size by over 50%. This is a very expensive product to only last a few weeks. Can’t return it because it’s still impossible to get back into the box, but this is junk. It’s comfortable except it’s very hot due to the memory foam inside. This needs about 50% more filling from the getgo in order to account for settling and such. I can’t recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: read_read_read

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bean bag. I got it almost a year ago and it is my go to watch tv in my living room. It is huge and cam fit 2 people on it. My dog also loves this bean bag and he sleeps on it all day long. It took a little bit to shape because the foam inside of it was all pieced together from being in the box. And it is really heavy, which makes sense because they are so big. I have fallen asleep on it multiple times and people usually choose to sleep there when they stay at my apartment. It is detestably my most comfortable piece of furniture in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Nowack

customer_reviews.title: Hair magnet watch out if you have pets!
customer_reviews.text: I guess it could use some more filling but it doesn’t bother me it’s not like I can feel the floor under me. Fits 2 ppl for sure, if you have pets this is a hair magnet! I only had it 2 days before my dog covered it with hair. just ordered a reusable lint roller specifically to clean this off so hopefully it won’t be to bad now
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: but honestly they just kind of blend in with the good bits of foam and you dont notice
customer_reviews.text: Its very comfy for one or two people, even fairly big people. Took a little work to break up the memory foam chunk that was compressed together, after that it was done fluffing in about 24 hours, I will say the foam that comes with it is not what I would call premium, it had bits of cardboard and hard rubberized chunks that are most certainly not memory foam mixed into it, but honestly they just kind of blend in with the good bits of foam and you dont notice, I still plan on buying some higher quality foam to throw in it at a later date, but its not needed to enjoy it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing right out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: The cover material feels plastic-y and cheap. The innermost zipper was partially open and caused the outer surface to be coated in tiny foam particles that I keep trying to remove but are firmly stuck on. The inner zipper is also missing its pull, which speaks to the quality (or lack thereof) of this product. There's also no removable cover and the foam has a chemical smell that makes me wonder what is going to be outgassing into my home for who knows how long. I now seem to be stuck with a 60-lb smelly baked potato since there's no way I can get this back into it's box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am in love! I bought this so I would have somewhere comfortable to read. I have fallen asleep on it every single time so far. Totally worth the money. My kids are already asking for one of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi L. Sheidy

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!! Naps, movie nights, reading spot. ready.
customer_reviews.text: It’s AWESOME. I’m 5’ 5” And it swallows me! This pic is only 10min out of the box and it was already that full. It’s not even 24 hours now and it’s at full fluff. Just roll it around a bunch, karate chop it etc and it fluffs up. It’s a bada$$ brown color but with like a bronze sheen? Looks GREAT. As I rolled it around some of the hair on the ground got on it but all you have to do it wipe with your hand lightly and it all just falls off, seems to not hold on to hair which is awesome. Super soft, 100% glad I got it. The 6ft XL.
customer_reviews.author: Maya W.

customer_reviews.title: Wont disappointe!
customer_reviews.text: BIG! Don't let the picture fool you. Very comfortable and soft. Is shipped compact, about the size of a large couch cushion. When you open it, you must pull apart the foam inside and allow to expand. I am 6ft tall and I have several inches from head and feet. Super cool and son loves it. We use it to watch movies and play video games. Wont regret IF you are looking for a large bean bag style couch. FYI, it is not filled with styrofoam beans. It is filled with chunks of soft foam, like egg crate or memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cole Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Bestest, most comfiest seating on earth!!
customer_reviews.text: Are you tired of only being kinda comfortable ir not at all? Well... add this baby to your life and you’ll never leave it’s comfort! No matter how to jump, flop, flip, roll, cuddle- it’s stays at a perfect 10 on the comfort level! I’m 5’9 and lay comfortably on it EVERY chance I get! Best purchase I’ve made during quarantine! Even had a close friend buy 2 after sitting in mine once! Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Each time we use it we have to manually adjust and fluff stuffing which are big pieces of foam. I was hoping it would have smaller chunks of foam but those are much bigger so they don't spread out evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Vlatka

customer_reviews.title: Not BAD but not PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: It's not BAD but it also doesn't maintain ANY sort of fluffy shape no matter how long it expands or how many times you fluff it. Also, buyer beware....it's not a large beanbag chair.... it's a freaking beanbag twin bed. Hah! This was actually a plus in my daughter's eyes. Then again....she didn't have to move all the furniture around to make it fit. My fault. Should have paid more attention to the size.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE OUR SOFA SACKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these sacks have been a hit! We have two smaller ones and this big papa in our living room for extra lounging space. Great quality and they smell like a new car lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Worms!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s big and comfortable but after a couple weeks worms were coming out of the beanbag. First it was one and so we just picked it up and let it outside but then a couple days later more worms were coming out. Worm eggs were in the filling. I live in a condo in South Florida so there isn’t much nature around me. I’m so disgusted! I want my money back! Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: We are brutal on furniture. I swear my son doesn't realize his size. I bought this near 2 years ago and it's in excellent shape today. Roll it around and it's like new! Seriously stain resistant, I have the tan one! We have a small dog that feels like a king plopped way up top when its fluffed up. It's even a guest bed for people under 5'5"... takes a beating like nothing I've ever owned. Its everybody's favorite seat. Only con is it is not good for sharing with people you don't want to be close to.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Go with the round one!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing! My mother bought the 6' round bag and we loved it and had to buy one for ourselves! We chose the "sofa style" because they advertise 2-3 adults VS. The recommended 2 adults for the round one. My mother's feels much bigger than ours and I wish we'd gone with that style, but who wants to return a giant bean bag😬
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The dog loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with saying that I am 5'9" and 250+ pounds. Initially, it is comfortable to sit in but hard to get out. While sitting in it, you can feel yourself sinking. Within an hour, I am basically sitting on the floor and it's super hard to get out of. The dog loves it. Being 80 pounds, he doesn't sink the way I do. But I have to make sure I fluff it for him otherwise he won't sit in it either. This is the most expensive dog bed I have ever bought but at least it is getting used! Would recommend for your dog or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic “couch”
customer_reviews.text: We love this gigantic sack couch! Like other reviewers state you need to unpack it where you plan on having it as moving it up two flights of stairs because my wife wanted it in a different place is something I never want to do ever again. Haha. When you receive it just start pulling apart the foam inside as it makes it much easier to “inflate”. Honestly it is very comfortable and big enough for 2 adults and a toddler in between.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Marohn

customer_reviews.title: If you’re considering buying this.. DO IT!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Bought it for my apartment, and it arrived today and looks great! Love the color, and it’s HUGE! As you can see it’s as big as my couch! It’s already fluffed quite nicely, I’m excited to see it at full capacity! Definitely a fun statement piece for my quirky little place!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfortable and has a lot of filling. Giving it 3 stars due to the fact that it isn't 6ft. I'm 5'9" and do not fit on it. It's much closer to 5'. Given that it isn't easily returnable, I'm now stuck with it. It's still very nice for the price but had I known it was only 5' I would've bought a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: CoryDorning

customer_reviews.title: Get 2 to Avoid the fight!!!!! U will love this
customer_reviews.text: This lemon memory foam bean bag is so amazing. I set it up I thought I would need more memory foam but know this feels perfect.
customer_reviews.author: HER Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Wow THIS IS BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I think I expected a little different shape or size or something, even tho, I must say, it looks just like the photo... so that is on me. Takes up a lot of space in my office, but is super comfy, for me and my dog! I will use this every day, when I need a break from my office chair. Laptop, cup of tea, my Lhasa, and the Soft Sofa. Now that is a good afternoon!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me, my 9 yr old and my dog. My boys actually fight over who is going to use it. I have fallen asleep in it several times. You do have to turn it or fluff it up to change the shape after you use it but that's expected it's a beanbag.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: As Show but Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The item came in a cube...it is a big foam block that you have to kneed and break apart in chunks. Those chunks stay exactly as you break them so you are laying on chunks of foam which are not comfortable. The bag itself is very very large as I expected, the navy blue color is nice and my 12 year old son and his brothers love it but I thought the inside would be more comfortable and evenly distributed. 4 star rating....
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Great at first...
customer_reviews.text: Great at first, but after using it for a bit (3months for us) they become useless and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: ThAzam

customer_reviews.title: Definitely want to unpack where you plan to leave it.
customer_reviews.text: Got a nice upper body workout trying to help decompress the large cube condition that it arrives in. Felt for and broke apart clumps after flipping and fluffing. There is a smell that reminds me of good sushi (seaweed and fresh fish and rice), but it is only noticeable if you are fully reclining. It seems to be fading. It also seems to retain and radiate body heat back to you.
customer_reviews.author: Reading is Fundamental

customer_reviews.title: Good, with a Significant Amount of Help...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ”pouch couch.” With that said, it should be noted that all of the memory foam chunks are NOT of the same quality. I opened mine to see if I could make it better, and I found large pieces with hard plastic covering a significant portion of the foam. Once I added over $100 of additional shredded memory foam and what was left of an old bean bag chair, this couch was amazingly comfortable. Hindsight, perhaps other companies charging closer to $300 would have premium memory foam within. Or you could risk it and modify it to suit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Colton H.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, never expanded well
customer_reviews.text: I end up sitting about 4 inches off the ground. I tried to break up the memory foam. It seems under filled. Seller very easy to deal with. Product itself is okaybfor the price but an adult Is going to sink to basically sitting on the floor. This picture is taken about 3 weeks later after i had been out of it for an hour
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: What you see you get! But know it's heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same one shown, the really large one and boy is it heavy! This is filled with like pieces of foam or something and OH SO COMFY! whenever we sit in it we melt and end up falling asleep. It can fit 3 adults comfortably and 4 teens with the dogs! The gigs and cats try to claim it as their own all the time, here is my big advice...fine EXACTLY where you want it go BEFORE you open it up to start expanding cause no joke it takes 3 of us to carry ours!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Sofa sack
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. It expanded pretty quickly and it's very comfortable. I bought it for my autistic son to use as both a crash pad and a nest. It works great for both, and I can fit on it with both kids to read together. It needs to be fluffed up after every couple uses but it's just a matter of flipping it over. It is actually comfortable enough to sleep on if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  If only...
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome, very comfortable! The only thing I wish is that it the stuffing were inside of it's own containment bag so that I could put the cover in the wash. Removing the stuffing to wash the cover results is a huge mess of dust and particles. Can't remove all of the dust from the cover, either, and I'm not sure it's even safe to put through the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Kreebler

customer_reviews.title: has to constantly flip the bag over and on top of itself to get enough clearance from the ground to be comfortable. After a couple times getting up and sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: The foam pieces did not puff up enough to fill (or even half fill) the bag. My daughter, who is not heavy, has to constantly flip the bag over and on top of itself to get enough clearance from the ground to be comfortable. After a couple times getting up and sitting back down, she is literally butt to floor. The picture is what sold me on this item and it's not like that at all. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Werling

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely to heavy to return and has no structure meaning it is a flat piece of “bean bag” shape with no durability. We will need to add additional stuffing in order to have any type of shape. Great for a young child’s room I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Shaw Family

customer_reviews.title: Trying to return and have no idea how to get this thing back in the box.  HELP please.
customer_reviews.text: The color was wrong and it was uncomfortable and lower quality than I thought it would be for the price. Really appreciate any help here.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge!!!! (That's what she said) it's super soft and comfy. I had a slight issue where I was partly touching floor (I'm a big guy as in fat) and so I just flipped and fluffed and in the air I was again. Only issue I have is that there is no cover that can be removed and washed
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Molina

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of it in the room but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it in the room but it does cause an issue with your back. The foam inside seems to take a longer. Of time to become softened for comfort. If you fall asleep on it you wake up in about 3 hours and back pain. Not just adults has back pain, my ten-year-old ends up with a hurt back to when he falls asleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, since I sent it as a gift. Unfortunately it appears to be the ugly vase of gift giving. Very uncomfortable, unwieldy and too hot. It turns to cement if it’s not moved regularly and it’s too big and heavy for that. The worst thing is how bad you feel after sitting in it for a prolonged period of time - about 100 years with chronic muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: Great lounging for the Kid Cave
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an extra sofa for the teenage kids, and they love it. Great for flopping own and lounging while watching movies with friends. How the heck do they get this huge sofa/lounger in a small box? It packs down tight, so takes a few days and some fluffing to get it to expand. After a few days, and rolling it around a bunch, it is huge. Great value, fun to have. We'll probably get another one or two...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fried

customer_reviews.title: Good value and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for our TV room in the master suite. Good value, my only complaint was how it was shipped. The box was completely destroyed, but luckily the product was not damaged. This is a heavy item and needs to be better packed for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Received mine today and was very disappointed. The bean bag is quite lumpy and doesn't look full and soft like the picture. Will give it another couple days to see if it fluffs up but the texture feels worse than the beads, the lumps of foam are quite large and stiff, and I pretty much sink to the ground. It also definitely has a smell, like when you buy a new foam mattress and need to air it out cause it's chemically smelling. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing is huge. I got it for my 11 year old daughter for Christmas because she wanted a "bean bag chair". Now, she sleeps on it, with our dog. That's how big it is. It didn't take the 4 to 5 days it was supposed to take to fully fluff up. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Says 3-5 days to get full sized. This is less than a day. I'm 5'10 220 and my son is 4'10 and we both love it. I saw some reviews about sinking to the floor but it's great. The cats love it too
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's birthday for in front of the tv in her room instead of a couch. She loves it. I plan to get another one for my other daughter's room at some point. I was skeptical at first when it was first expanding, but after a few days it was fully expanded and super comfortable. We had 8 teenagers over and they all tried to fit, but only 3 or 4 of them fit at a time. Haha Comical to see them try however. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable expansion!
customer_reviews.text: This is single handedly THE best comfort purchase we've bought for our new house. I feel bad for the UPS guy that deliver it. When we finally got this thing downstairs & opened it up all I can say is wow! Breaking up the foam was a good workout & lots of fun. It has steadily grown in size over the past 2 days. It's huge & we LOVE it. If you really don't have a large room to put this in, it's not for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great HUGE bag
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo daughter bought a purple one for her room. Took about a week to fully fluff out. Its HUGE! She loves it. She had a friend sleep over the other night and they both comfortably slept on it and still had room.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Your ticket to relaxation!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Super easy to refluff and grew to its full size within two days. Our full grown saint bernard loves it, and our lab can fit on it too. Perfectly fits two people to cuddle on, and the padding is super soft and supportive. Best $100 I have ever spent, and plan to buy more once we move to our permanent residence. If you're unsure of whether to purchase this or not, please do!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! Very comfortable and the quality is unbeatable. The material is incredibly soft and stain resistant. I bought this for my 9 Year old son who immediately spilled a full soda in it.. the material completely repelled the liquid and I was able to wipe it down with just a damp paper towel.. you would never know it happened, not sticky, still soft! My son loves his giant bean bag chair. Only down side is that it is quite heavy, and requires a bit of muscle to move, but that's ok with me, it means it stays where I want it and doesn't wander. Totally recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Johns mom

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: You practically sit on the floor this never got up to size its been like 2 months of turning and fluffing and its still not up. Don't fall on it because you will hit the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: I am writing this on the bean bag.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive? Ye. Soft? Durable? Big? Addictive? Also yeah. I basically haven't left the house in weeks send help.
customer_reviews.author: Grawlix

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and large!
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag is so worth the money! It’s much bigger than I expected, but goes with the description! It can fit two people comfortably. Definitely worth the value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the specifications so you know what you're getting in to
customer_reviews.text: My fault - should have looked at the specifications more. I was looking for a beanbag chair to lug in and out of my den so I can hide it when we have company. This thing is HUGE, weighs a TON, and is AWKWARD as hell to move. My wife and kid love it because they can use it as a bed, but I'm 6'2" so it's not even good for that with me. The "beans" are compressing again so it is assuming some shape that it wants to assume and isn't easy to fluff out. So, if you won't be moving it around and don't care that this thing is heavy and cumbersome you might like it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Klug

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes the sofa sack so much she exclusively sleeps on it instead of our bed. I miss my wife at night but I’m very happy she has found a comfortable way to rest, especially since she has MS.
customer_reviews.author: Erik G.

customer_reviews.title: The heart of our living room
customer_reviews.text: This was instantly the favorite piece of furniture in our home. But his are ALWAYS on it. They fall asleep on it at night. They jump onto it from the couch over and over (great exercise). Occasionally I get to use it without being dogpiled, and it's so soft that I have a hard time staying awake.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a birthday gift to my friend and it's honestly such a nice quality for the price. Also, it's HUGE. I would recommend getting a cover though because it does not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Prathana Gurung

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag is huge! Definitely put it in the spot that you want to keep it first, before opening it, because once you open it and it fluffs up, it's very heavy to move, but still possible to move. This is huge. I love the foam on the inside instead of beans. It makes it much more comfortable. I would definitely buy another one of these and the price is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Sons game room. It took two days to come to complete size but well worth the purchase. This sack can hold three normal sized adults. I've caught him sleeping it this a few times. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: desiree n. andrus

customer_reviews.title: It was supposed to be blue but it was black so we just kept it only thing I didn't like about that.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and was delivered to the address I sent it to you few days late but they got it. I ordered several others in different colors Some showed up not in the color dark pink was a very light light pink& had some problems with them not showing up at all and saying they were delivered sent to one address and it went to the other address even though I went over and over with customer service to make sure it goes to the right address but all in all they all are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Green

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable you can sleep in it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. It is more firm than soft- but not in a bad way (more supportive than typical bean bag chair). I just got this so I am unsure about the durability. It is so comfortable that I fell asleep in it by accident once. Large enough for adults to comfortably lay in.
customer_reviews.author: CANDRA HODGE

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: This lounger is big enough for two but you can sleep comfortably on it too. It's rugged enough for kids to jump on, and soft enough to snuggle up on.
customer_reviews.author: coachsuze

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, soft cover and just the right firmness so you don’t sink to the floor. Follow the instructions to set up and you won’t have any issues. I’ve been looking for something like this for our loft and this does not disappoint!!!! Our family loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: YOU MUST ROTATE IT or it wont keep its shape and wont be cozy to sit on
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter for the living room....its HUGE but super cozy the only thing is, you have to rotate it daily or adter.yoube lounged in it.because.of.the memory foam.which is no biggie EXCEPT that its SUPER HEAVY and.Awkward so it takes two people to trun it over...oh and no handles either so its not easy but other than that its great...we all fight over who gets to sit in it lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this and the Big Joe XXL
customer_reviews.text: This one needs less fluffing and I work myself to the ground less often on this one. Love them both, but this one gets higher marks.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, smell sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the price; however, the smell is a little much. I have it in my room and had to put candles in my room to get rid of the smell. This is my second day of having it I've read that the smell goes away after a few days. If you have a sensitive nose I suggest leaving it in another room that you dont sleep in until the smell goes away although itll suck putting it in the desired spot, itll be worth not having to deal with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Dame

customer_reviews.title: Its Huge and Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: We turn it after every use (or before if we forgot haha) Perfect for our 2 kids and us to hang out and read books!! So big and fluffy! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy more foam to fill...
customer_reviews.text: My son got this chair yesterday and likes it. He wishes there was a bit more foam in it but it works as is. The fabric is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: mackaymom

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price point!
customer_reviews.text: Same concept as bean bag chairs but with shredded foam chunks so yes, you can feel the foam pieces. Not sure what people were expecting... It's not like they feel like rocks or anything. Only 1 day and fluffing is going nicely. Very comfy so far. Some very minor odor (putting your face right into it) but again it's only been a day. Worth the spend!
customer_reviews.author: wirelessless

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It smells, it's too cumbersome to deal with, it is uncomfortable with large/small chunks of foam, it loses shape easily/quickly. eh. regretting
customer_reviews.author: camegna

customer_reviews.title: but fluffs out nicely in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It is very heavy and comes in a packed square, but fluffs out nicely in 2 days. About every 2 weeks we just wiggle it from both sides and it fluffs right up.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Needs more stuffing
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this gift. I am disappointed. I opened it 5 days before Christmas to give it time to expand. It expanded but just looks like a giant blob. It needs more stuffing. Mine does not come close to looking like the fullness of the photo.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nothing like the pictures. It is “memory foam” but if you open it up it is nothing more than carpet padding cut up.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Bean bag really begins to sag a lot...
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag chair starts off pretty nice...but after just two weeks, the stuffing breaks down quite a bit. The bag sinks to the floor--while losing some of its comfy cushioning. And this was primarily from my toddler--who weighs all of 30 lbs. It's ok. Also, be prepared to endure a "chemical" smell when first opening the package. It lingers for about 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Philip R.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product -- impossible to return
customer_reviews.text: My son has this bean bag and we loved it. We ordered another one for my daughter. It comes super-compressed -- about one-third the size of the eventual full-size bean bag. When we opened the package there was inner-material all over the bag. We found several tears along the seam. We were told to return it. We now have to figure out how to fit a 5 foot bean bag in a two foot box.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! And it’s super heavy. I bought it as extra seating in the kids game room. You need to spend some time separating the foam bits so it’s not as lumpy. But it’s actually really comfy, even for a grown adult. I had my 80 pound dog model for size comparison. The picture was taken about 4 hours after unpacking it.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.M.

product_meta.title: Sofa Sack - Plush Bean Bag Sofas with Super Soft Microsuede Cover - XL Memory Foam Stuffed Lounger Chairs for Kids, Adults, Couples - Jumbo Bean Bag Chair Furniture - Charcoal 6'
product_meta.description:
Color:Charcoal

 The Perfect Sleeper For Little Kids, Big Kids, and Adults That Are Kids At Heart
A retro staple with a modern twist, this supersoft bedroom, dorm, playroom, and nursery accessory is both stylish and fun. A throwback to the 60’s, the Sofa Sack hippy bean bags embrace the laid-back attitude of an earlier time. With a sturdy yet very comfortable structure of memory foam stuffing, double-stitched passion suede, and an assortment of colors and sizes for the choosing, this versatile line of child and teenage room furniture is the perfect addition to any room. Great for reading, cuddling, watching movies, playing videos games, or just lounging, the Sofa Sack bean bag collection is a must for every room in your home. They are also great for daycares, classrooms, preschools, libraries, and study rooms or for college students gaming or studying in their dorm room, basement, or bedroom. Measuring at 6 feet around, this fun bean bag couch is the perfect size for all shapes and sizes. 

 The Perfect Gift
These adult size memory foam loungers make fun, unique presents for birthdays, Christmas, graduations, baby showers, and housewarmings. 

 Product Details:
Dimensions: 34" H x 72" W x 48"
Microsuede, Ultra Soft Fabric
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT BEDROOM ACCESSORY: Simple and soft, The Sofa Sack 2 person oversized bean bag chair lounger is the perfect addition to every playroom, child’s bedroom, or basement. With vibrant colors to choose from, this sofa is a perfect compliment to any decor.

A BEAN CHAIR WITHOUT BEANS: These huge, colorful beanless bags are comprised of high quality memory foam, which provide a more malleable and luxurious feel than regular bean chairs. These lounge chairs not only contour to your body, but also provide long-lasting support.

DURABLE CONSTRUCT: Our bean bag furniture is made with high-performance foam stuffing, encased in velvet, passion suede with double stitching for maximum durability. Comfortably fits 2 kids or adults, these big stuffed chairs will provide countless hours of relaxing chill time.

EXPANDING COZINESS: Soft and velvety to the touch, these multi person bean bags are adult sized for sitting, napping, and lounging. 6 feet in length, our roomy lounging chairs can double as a bed, recliner, or loveseat. Toddlers and kids can share with friends or siblings.

ONE SOFA, MANY USES: Portable and versatile, these foam bags are a great alternative to blow-up beds, sleeping bags, or day beds for slumber parties and overnight guests. Furnish game rooms, dorm rooms, or play rooms with them for movie night, game night, play dates, reading, or just cuddle time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars926 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
